recipe_name: Prawns and purple sprouting broccoli with chilli and lemon
author: Simon Rimmer
method: Heat the oil in a wok until very hot. Add the prawns and stir-fry for three minutes. Add the purple sprouting broccoli, anchovies, chilli flakes and garlic and stir-fry for a further 2-3 minutes.  Add the lemon juice, pak choi and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Stir-fry for 30 seconds then transfer to four serving bowls. Sprinkle each dish with sesame seeds and a little freshly grated nutmeg and serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp vegetable oil,  16 king prawns, peeled ,  300g/10½oz purple sprouting broccoli, blanched and refreshed in cold water,  2 canned anchovies, drained and chopped,  1½ tsp dried chilli flakes,  1 garlic clove, sliced,  1 lemon, juice only,  1 head pak choi, finely sliced,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tsp sesame seeds,  ½ tsp freshly grated nutmeg
